places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Rest Inn
address: Sai Sparsh Complex, Near Bank of Maharashtra, Pratapsinh Chowk Bye Pass Road, Savtamali Nagar, Akluj, Maharashtra 413101, India

reviews.text:
Little bit disappointed with room service but cleanliness, hygiene, overall stay experience rating would be 10 out of 10
Owner is very cooperative & helpful person
Excellent customer service and staying experience...... overall It was an awesome experience.......for food you can eat outside anywhere wherever you want..

Pro: Rooms are well designed, spacious, and have enough sunlight. It's close to Akluj bus stand and have good affordable local cuisine. I was traveling for work and had good stay in September 2023.
Con: They initially didn't provide drinking water but packed bottled drinking water, this issue I faced most hotels of Solapur. They try to sell packed bottled water for additional income, which can be tricky if you are staying for longer period of time. Though staffs were really friendly and provided us RO water on request till we stayed.

The Hotel Rest Inn is a popular hotel located in a bustling city center. Upon arriving at the hotel, guests are greeted by friendly and professional staff who are eager to assist with any needs or questions.

The lobby of the hotel is elegantly designed with comfortable seating areas and plenty of natural light, creating a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere. Check-in is a breeze, and guests are quickly directed to their rooms.

The guest rooms at the Hotel Rest Inn are spacious and tastefully decorated, with a range of amenities to make guests' stays comfortable and enjoyable. Each room is equipped with a comfortable bed, high-quality linens, a flat-screen TV, a mini-fridge, and a work desk.

The hotel also features a variety of on-site amenities, including a restaurant serving delicious meals, a fitness center equipped with modern exercise equipment, and a swimming pool where guests can relax and unwind.

One of the standout features of the Hotel Rest Inn is its excellent customer service. The staff is always willing to go above and beyond to ensure that guests have a pleasant and enjoyable stay. From arranging transportation to recommending local attractions, the hotel staff is always ready to help.

Overall, the Hotel Rest Inn provides a welcoming and comfortable home away from home for travelers visiting the city. With its convenient location, excellent amenities, and top-notch customer service, it's no wonder that so many guests choose to stay at this hotel when visiting the area.

places_with_reviews.name: Galande Hotel pure veg (Akluj Kr )
address: Velapur - Akluj Rd, Vidya Nagar, Malewadi, Maharashtra 413118, India

reviews.text: Visited the place with lot of expectations. Average food quality with average service. Parking place is available. Seperate dining hall. Seperate small hall for celebration. Okay to try.

▪️Ambience ✅️ - This restaurant has AVERAGE ambience and interior.
▪️ Sitting Arrangement :- It is nice with good circulation space.
▪️ Seperate Sitting Arrangement For Breakfast Items or Quick Bite Items.
▪️Food quality 🍽 - Good. 👍🏼
▪️Food quantity🥗 - Average serving portion. Good  Quantity.
▪️Food tried :- Akkha Masoor, Kaju Masala and Chapati.
▪️Food Taste 😋 :- Both the servings are tasty. One suggestion is that try to avoid food colour in gravy.
▪️Accessible♿️✅ - THIS PLACE IS ACCESSIBLE FOR ♿.
▪️Price and payment💵💳🧾 - Accept all types of mobile, card and cash payments. Prices are moderate.✅️
▪️Service 🤵🧑‍🍳 - The staff is polite , service is quick and the serving staff is well trained.

▪️Other Specifications :-
1. Seperate Sitting For Quick bite Items and Separate For Lunch or Dinner.
2. Parking space is limited almost you have park on roadside.
Overall Nice Experience.

More than expected. Love the ambiance. Perfect place for family dining. Small menu but taste awesome. Small Gathering and Party hall are also there. Food quality and quantity is great. Mostly famous for Breakfast and Vada Pav. Staff is also friendly and ordes you ahead. Little bit crowded on weekends. Highly recommended for vegitarian people.

Title: A Pleasant Vegetarian Retreat: Veg Treat in Aakluj, Maharashtra

Review:

Located in the serene town of Aakluj, Maharashtra, Veg Treat is a delightful hotel that offers a South Indian culinary experience with a focus on vegetarian cuisine. The restaurant is a haven for those seeking a taste of authentic South Indian breakfast in the early hours of the day. While the absence of tea or coffee may come as a surprise, Veg Treat makes up for it with its decent rates, pleasing taste, and commendable service.

Veg Treat's commitment to vegetarianism is evident from the moment you step foot inside. The ambience is inviting, with a clean and comfortable dining area that sets the stage for a satisfying meal. As a dedicated South Indian restaurant, Veg Treat excels in providing an array of flavorful dishes to appease any palate.

Early birds will find solace in the fact that Veg Treat opens its doors with a range of delectable South Indian breakfast options. From crispy dosas and fluffy idlis to steaming vadas and mouth-watering uttapams, the breakfast menu promises a delightful start to the day. The dishes are prepared with care, showcasing the authentic flavors and traditional recipes of the region.

Despite the lack of tea or coffee, Veg Treat manages to maintain its reputation with its decent rates. The affordability of the menu is certainly a plus point, making it an accessible dining choice for individuals and families alike. Moreover, the reasonable pricing does not compromise the taste or quality of the food.

The taste at Veg Treat lives up to its reputation of being decent. Each dish is prepared with precision, allowing the flavors to shine through. Whether you prefer a spicy treat or a milder option, the restaurant caters to different palates, ensuring a satisfying dining experience for all.

The service at Veg Treat is commendable, with attentive staff members who are friendly and quick to assist. The waiters are knowledgeable about the menu, helping guests navigate through the diverse offerings and suggesting popular dishes. The prompt service adds to the overall positive experience, making patrons feel valued and well taken care of.

In conclusion, Veg Treat in Aakluj, Maharashtra, offers a pleasant vegetarian retreat for South Indian food enthusiasts. While the absence of tea or coffee may be a drawback for some, the decent rates, delicious taste, and quality service more than compensate for it. Whether you're a local resident or a visitor passing through, Veg Treat is definitely worth a visit for an authentic South Indian breakfast experience in a serene setting.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Girme-Best Pure Veg Restaurant in Akluj
address: Malewadi akluj Akluj velapure road, near, Malewadi Rd - Akluj, Vidya Nagar, Malewadi, Akluj, Maharashtra 413101, India

reviews.text:
Readily available birthday party decoration. Best ambience. One thing noticed about triangular seats. That are uncomfortable, needs to change that.
We have taken parcel from here. Food quality and food quantity is very good.
Must recommend.

I visited Hotel Girme today and was pleasantly surprised by the readily available birthday party decorations. The ambience was simply the best, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. However, one noticeable drawback was the triangular seats, which were uncomfortable, and I believe they need to improve that aspect.

We also ordered a parcel from here, and I must say the food quality and quantity were top-notch. The flavors were exceptional, and the portion sizes were generous. Overall, Hotel Girme - हॉटेल गिरमे is a fantastic pure veg restaurant with fantastic food, but a minor seating adjustment could enhance the overall experience.
